data.meanings: to be white. qamarun - moon (especially from the 3rd to 26th night).
data.sentence: The word وَالْقَمَرُ comes from the root ق م ر and is associated with the meanings: to be white. qamarun - moon (especially from the 3rd to 26th night).

data.meanings: to be bright with sunshine, be glorious, be sunny. shams - sun.
data.sentence: The word الشَّمْسُ comes from the root ش م س and is associated with the meanings: to be bright with sunshine, be glorious, be sunny. shams - sun.

data.meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.
data.sentence: The word بِحُسْبَانٍ comes from the root ح س ب and is associated with the meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.
